definition: corpus luteum (glands in female mammals producing progesterone)
luteal phase (period in the menstrual cycle when an embryo can implant in the womb)

sentences.english: A luteal phase defect may also occur.
sentences.chinese: 也可能会出现黄体期不足。

sentences.english: These are derived from wild yams and soybeans.
sentences.chinese: 天然黄体酮萃取自野生山药和豆科植物。

sentences.english: This is an adult ovary with two corpora lutea.
sentences.chinese: 图示成年人卵巢，可见两个黄体。

sentences.english: No change after menstrual type of luteal function had no significant impact.
sentences.chinese: 术后月经类型无改变，对黄体功能无明显影响。

sentences.english: Progesterone is a hormone with different actions dependent on the period in the oestrous cycle.
sentences.chinese: 黄体酮为孕激素，在动物发情周期中起调控作用。

sentences.english: The concentration of LH arrived at the highest value on the day of oestrus and decreased gradually after that day.
sentences.chinese: 促黄体素的含量在发情当日达到最高值以后逐渐下降。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of color ultrasound in diagnosis of the corpus luteum rupture.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价彩色多普勒超声对黄体破裂的诊断价值。

sentences.english: Symptoms should occur in the luteal phase only.
sentences.chinese: 这些症状只发生在黄体期。

sentences.english: Is to increase your luteal function.
sentences.chinese: 是为了提高你的黄体功能。

sentences.english: The product is a synthetic decapeptide analog of Luteinizing-hormone releasing hormone (LHRH).
sentences.chinese: 本品为促黄体素释放激素的合成十肽类似物。

sentences.english: Large number of human lutein and zeaxanthin intake, can reduce the prevalence rate.
sentences.chinese: 人体大量摄取黄体素和玉米黄质，能降低患病率。

sentences.english: Function of latter department corpus luteum is maladjusted , see Yu Yoling more period woman.
sentences.chinese: 后者系黄体功能失调，多见于育龄期妇女。

sentences.english: The length of the luteal phase determines the time of ovulation within your menstrual cycle.
sentences.chinese: 黄体期的长度决定了月经周期内排卵的时间。

sentences.english: Note the dark red-black hemorrhagic region surrounded by a thin rim of yellow corpus luteum.
sentences.chinese: 可见暗红色的出血区被一薄层黄体包绕。

sentences.english: LH and P4 reached their peaks at 15th day of pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 在怀孕15d时，促黄体素和孕酮的分泌达到峰值。

sentences.english: The corpus luteum of the previous pregnancy regresses very rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 前次妊娠的黄体很快开始退化。

definition: luteal phase (period in the menstrual cycle when an embryo can implant in the womb)
